name: Guard Dog
desc: Immune to Intimidate. Intimidated: +1 Attack. Cannot be forced to switch out.
shortDesc: Immune to Intimidate. Intimidated: +1 Attack. Cannot be forced to switch out.

flavorText.sv: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
